prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Health and Wellness Insider.
Title: The Impact of Mental Health on Physical Fitness: A 5-Year Longitudinal Study.
Description: This article delves into a comprehensive longitudinal study, examining the intricate relationship between mental health and physical fitness over a span of 5 years. The findings shed light on how improvements in mental health could possibly enhance physical fitness and vice versa.
Yes I am interested

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Artistic Visions
Title: Exploring the Renaissance: The Intersection of Art, Culture, and Politics
Description: This article seeks to provide a nuanced perspective on the Renaissance period, looking beyond just the art to include the cultural and political shifts of the era. It also includes an interactive timeline and high-quality images of key historical artifacts.
yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EcoWarrior
Title: How Urban Farming Could Revolutionize Our Cities: A Case Study on Detroit
Description: This article explores the burgeoning field of urban farming through the lens of Detroit, a city that has embraced this trend to revitalize abandoned areas. Through interviews with local farmers, city planners, and residents, it provides a deep-dive into the environmental, social, and economic impacts of urban agriculture.
yes I would like to read that

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Quantum Computing Daily
Title: Quantum Entanglement: A Deep Dive into Non-locality and Superposition
Description: This article explores the complex concepts of quantum entanglement, non-locality, and superposition. It features in-depth discussions and explanations from world-renowned physicists, thought-provoking theories, and the latest research in quantum physics. The article is designed to be accessible for those new to the field, while still providing substantial depth for those familiar with quantum mechanics.
No I don't want to read that one

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Culinary Explorer
Title: Unveiling the Secrets of Sushi: From Edo Traditions to Modern Innovations
Description: This article offers a history and guide to sushi, tracing its roots in Edo-era Japan to its contemporary global popularity. It provides step-by-step instructions for preparing sushi at home, complete with sumptuous photographs and expert tips, as well as an exploration of innovative trends in sushi-making. Moreover, the article addresses issues of sustainability in the sushi industry and suggests eco-friendly choices for sushi lovers.
yes I would like to read that

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AstroNews
Title: Mysterious Radio Waves from Deep Space: What Are Fast Radio Bursts?
Description: Dive into the enigmatic world of astrophysics with this in-depth exploration of Fast Radio Bursts (FRBs). Uncover what these mysterious signals from deep space are, what might be causing them, and how astronomers around the globe are using advanced technology to detect and study them. The article also features interviews with leading experts in the field and discusses the implications of FRBs on our understanding of the universe.
yes i really want to read that one

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Social Dynamics 101
Title: The Role of Social Media in Contemporary Politics: An Analysis of its Impact on Election Campaigns and Public Opinion
Description: This article delves into the increasingly complex relationship between social media and politics, examining how platforms such as Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram are used during election campaigns. It explores the strategies employed by politicians to sway public opinion, the role of social media in propagating fake news, and the impact of these factors on democracy. The article features insights from political analysts, data scientists, and social media activists, and includes case studies from recent elections around the world.
no thank you

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Cryptocurrency Central
Title: Investing in Cryptocurrencies: Risks and Opportunities in the Blockchain Revolution
Description: This article offers an insightful guide for beginners looking to invest in cryptocurrencies. It delves into the blockchain technology, the risks involved, strategies for successful trading, and the potential future of crypto. It also emphasizes the role of cryptocurrencies in shaping the global economy and features advice from top financial experts in the field.
I am a little interested

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Historical Antiquities Review
Title: Unraveling the Mysteries of Ancient Egypt: A Detailed Analysis of Hieroglyphics and Their Significance
Description: This article offers an in-depth study of Ancient Egyptian hieroglyphics, exploring their origins, evolution, and cultural significance. It also includes a step-by-step guide to interpreting hieroglyphic texts, featuring high-resolution images of famous inscriptions. Moreover, it delves into the latest research and theories in Egyptology and highlights how modern technology is shedding new light on ancient mysteries.
yes that sounds good

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Personal Finance 101
Title: An In-depth Look at the Stock Market: From Basic Concepts to Advanced Trading Strategies
Description: This article serves as a comprehensive guide to the stock market for both beginners and seasoned investors. Starting with basic concepts such as how stocks work and why companies go public, it gradually delves into complex topics like different trading strategies, interpreting market trends, and understanding financial indicators. It also features expert advice on portfolio management, risk assessment, and long-term investment planning.
no that does not sound exciting right now

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Empathy in Engineering
Title: The Human Side of Technology: Balancing Technical Skills with Emotional Intelligence in the Tech Industry
Description: This article examines the often overlooked importance of emotional intelligence in the technology industry. It explores how engineers and tech professionals can cultivate empathy, improve their communication skills, and foster a more inclusive and collaborative work environment. Through interviews with industry leaders, psychologists, and HR experts, the article provides actionable steps for individuals and businesses to create a more balanced tech industry, where soft skills are valued alongside technical expertise.
hmm that might be interesting

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Intrepid Traveler. Title: Space Tourism - The Final Frontier: An Inside Look into the Prospects and Challenges. Description: This article delves into the exciting yet controversial subject of space tourism. It discusses the technological advancements that have made space travel possible for non-astronauts, the companies spearheading this endeavor, the prospective costs, and the ethical and environmental implications. It also includes interviews with experts in the field of space exploration, technology, ethics, and environment, and provides readers with a balanced view on the future of space tourism.
yes I would like to read that

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Ethical AI Advocate. Title: The Future of Artificial Intelligence: Balancing Innovation with Ethical Considerations. Description: This article discusses the rapid advancements in AI and the accompanying ethical implications. It explores the potential risks and benefits of AI, the current regulatory landscape, and potential strategies for ensuring the responsible development and use of AI technology. The article features interviews with leading AI researchers, ethicists, and policy-makers. It also includes case studies examining how AI is currently being used across various sectors and the ethical dilemmas this poses.
i am interested in this one

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Hobbyist Heaven. Title: The Thrill of Stamp Collecting: From History to Techniques. Description: This article takes a deep dive into the world of philately, exploring the fascinating history and techniques of stamp collecting. It sheds light on the significance of stamp motifs, the art of stamp preservation, and the joy of discovering unique stamps from around the world. Additionally, it contains interviews with prominent philatelists and showcases their prized collections, offering a unique insight into this intriguing hobby. Whether you're a seasoned collector or a novice looking to start a new hobby, this comprehensive guide covers all you need to know about the world of philately.
no thanks i am not interested in stamps

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
